item.title: Time Series Lecture note - One
item.description: This course’s title is :Introduction ot Time Series Analysis and Forecasting Instrutor: Dr.Timothy Wu from United International College What is Time Series 按照时间的顺序把随机事件变化发展的过程记录下来就构成了一个时间序列。对时间序列进行观察、研究，找寻它变化发展的规律，预测它将来的走势就是时间序列分析。 Basically, Time Series is a sequential random variables indexed by time. We observe, collect them and find the regular pattern of this sequence; do the forecasting or prediction. Most forecasting problems involve the use of time series data A time series is a time-oriented (very much closely related to time) sequence of observation on a veriable of interest.
